query:
INSERT INTO recipe_ingredients (recipeId, ingredientId, quantity, unit, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM recipes WHERE name = 'Test Shrimp Recipe'),
  (SELECT id FROM ingredients WHERE name = 'Test Shrimp'),
  10.0000,
  'pc',
  NOW(),
  NOW();
